contentList.content: Focus on defending yourself and avoiding incoming strikes. Attacks against you are made with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">disadvantage</LsTag> until the start of your next turn.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Whenever you take the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dodge">Dodge</LSTag> action during combat, you can regain a number of hit points equal to your Hit Die + your Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> (minimum of 1).

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Whenever you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on your chosen <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityScore">Ability Score</LSTag>, you can reroll one of the dice.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1, to a maximum of 20. Whenever you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> using <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, you can reroll one of the dice.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> score is increased by 1, to a maximum of 20. Whenever you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> using <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, you can reroll one of the dice.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score is increased by 1, to a maximum of 20. Whenever you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> using <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, you can reroll one of the dice.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score is increased by 1, to a maximum of 20. Whenever you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> using <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag>, you can reroll one of the dice.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to cold damage and poison damage. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag>.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to poison damage
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to cold damage

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
When you <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> fire damage for a spell you cast, you can reroll the fire damage dice, but you must use the new roll.
Whenever you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you can wrap yourself in an <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Fire_Aura">Aura of Fire</LSTag>.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by 5 feet. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in the <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag> skill. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on any Athletics or Acrobatics check you make to escape from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GRAPPLED">Grappled</LSTag>.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag>. If you’re already proficient in either skill, your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is doubled for any check you make with that skill.

You gain 3 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="LuckPoint">Luck Points</LSTag>. Whenever you make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, an <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can spend one luck point to roll an additional d20. You can also spend one luck point when an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> is made against you. In combat you activate your luck. Until your next turn you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on attack rolls, ability checks or saving throws.
Your enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">disadvantage</LsTag> on their attack rolls against you. If more than one creature spends a luck point to influence the outcome of a roll, the points cancel each other out; no additional dice are rolled. You regain your expended luck points when you finish a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

Until your next turn you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, an <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Your enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">disadvantage</LsTag> on their attack rolls against you. You regain your expended luck points when you finish a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

Your attacks and spells ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to poison damage. You can coat a weapon in poison as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
You are able to use a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Summon_PoisonersKit">Poisoner's Kit</LSTag>.

Poisoner's Kit. Combine with items to create poisons and other items. PoisonerKit + Basic Poison = Wyvern Poison; PoisonerKit + Wyvern Poison = Drow Poison; PoisonerKit + Healing Potion = Basic Poison (2), + Greater Healing = Basic Poison (4)
Weapons coated with Drow Assassin Poison deal an extra 1d6 of poison damage for a period of one minute.
Weapons coated with Magic Drow Assassin Poison deal an extra 1d6 of NECROTIC poison damage for a period of one minute.

Magic Poisoner's Kit. Combine with items to create poisons and other items. MagicPoisonerKit + Basic Poison = Magic Drow Assassin Poison (Necrotic Dmg); MagicPoisonerKit + Healing Potion = Basic Poison (2), MagicPoisonerKit+ Greater Healing = Basic Poison (4)
You learn one Eldritch Invocation option of your choice from the Warlock class.

You can try to hide when you are only <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING_LIGHTLY_OBSCURED">Lightly Obscured</LSTag>.
When you are hidden from a creature and miss it with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag>, your attack doesn't reveal your position.
Dim light doesn't impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">disadvantage</LsTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag> made with sight.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag>

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in the Acrobatics skill. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LsTag> on any Athletics or Acrobatics <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag> you make to escape from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GRAPPLED">Grappled</LSTag>.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in the Athletics skill. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LsTag> on any Athletics or Acrobatics <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag> you make to escape from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GRAPPLED">Grappled</LSTag>.

You can try to hide when you are only <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING_LIGHTLY_OBSCURED">Lightly Obscured</LSTag>.
When you are hidden from a creature and miss it with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attacks</LSTag>, your attack doesn't reveal your position.
Dim light doesn't impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">disadvantage</LsTag> on Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag> made with sight.
When you are hidden from a creature and miss it with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">ranged weapon attack</LSTag>, your attack doesn't reveal your position.
In dim light you have advantage on perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag>.
In dim light you have advantage on stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag>.
A poisoner's kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons
A magic poisoner's kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons that do necrotic damage

You gain the following benefits: Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> score by 1, to a maximum of 20. Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by 5 feet.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in the Acrobatics skill. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Sdvantage">Advantage</LsTag> on any Athletics or Acrobatics <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag> you make to escape from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GRAPPLED">Grappled</LSTag>.

You gain the following benefits: Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> score by 1, to a maximum of 20. Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by 5 feet.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in the Athletics skill. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Sdvantage">Advantage</LsTag> on any Athletics or Acrobatics <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">checks</LSTag> you make to escape from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GRAPPLED">Grappled</LSTag>.

Until the start of your next turn, any <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against you has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> if you can see the attacker, and you make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
When you take the dodge action you also regain [1].

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score by 1, up to a maximum of 20. While you aren't wearing armor, you can calculate your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">AC</LSTag> as 13 + your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> modifier.
You can grow retractable claws from the tips of your fingers. The claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DragonHide_Melee">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag>.
While you aren't wearing armor, you can calculate your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">AC</LSTag> as 13 + your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> modifier.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have a +5 bonus to your Perception and Investigation scores.

You learn one Druid <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag> of your choice. You also learn <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Longstrider">Longstrider</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PassWithoutTrace">Pass Without Trace</LSTag>, each of which you can cast once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for all 3 spells is Wisdom.
You can grow retractable claws from the tips of your fingers. The claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DragonHide_Melee">Unarmed Strikes</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> score is increased by 1, to a maximum of 20. Whenever you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> using <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, you can reroll one of the dice.

Whenever you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LsTag> on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> using <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag>, you can reroll one of the dice.

Increase one <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityScore">Ability Score</LSTag> of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20. You gain proficiency in one <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skill</LSTag> of your choice.
Choose one skill in which you have proficiency. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> with that skill. The skill you choose must be one that isn't already benefiting from a feature, such as Expertise, that doubles your proficiency bonus.
A poisoner's kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons.
